infos.value: Well fought, Owe. Now, to take these relics...
I fear not, Your Highness. The true test of our skills begins now, it would appear...
Looks like we got here just in time.
I recognize you two... Dorando and Gargas.
What an honor, aye? To be known by the great Sir Owe!
How did you know to find us here?
Seemed like a good day for fresh air, is all.
And fresh blood, aye? How 'bout it? A little skirmish to celebrate this happy coincidence.
They serve Sadali, and yet they lead Fennes's troops.
So they have come here at Muraga's behest, then.
What're your soldiers carrying back there?
Ohh... That must be what Muraga wanted us to report back on, aye?
I assume that retreat is not a choice at this juncture.
Queen Helena, please step back. Allow me to handle these two.
Gonna stand and fight? How gallant!
What a day, aye? I never dreamed I would get to take Owe's head!
Go ahead and take it...if you can!
